entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story who is trying to get something from Hermione's hand.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A person whose hand Harry is trying to free, described as having a tight grip on a paper.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: A person mentioned in the context of being blocked from view by Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: A person who is keeping watch while Harry tries to free the paper from Hermione's hand.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to get something (the paper) from Hermione's hand, as described in the text: 'While Ron kept watch he tugged and twisted, and at last, after several tense minutes, the paper came free'.
Harry is blocking Madam Pomfrey's view, as described in the text: 'blocked Harry from Madam Pomfreyâ€™s view'.
Ron is keeping watch while Harry tries to free the paper, as described in the text: 'While Ron kept watch he tugged and twisted...'.
